tool_description: Baseball Leagues & Cups with Livescore, Odds, Bookmakers, Statistics, Standings, Historical Data, Countries, Seasons. Documentation : https://api-sports.io/documentation/baseball/v1. Widgets : https://www.api-football.com/widgets
name: API-BASEBALL
title: API-BASEBALL

api_list.name: timezone
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-baseball.p.rapidapi.com/timezone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-baseball.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
